solution_line_template: In one week, the 3 men can eat {jake_per_week} + {brother_per_week} + {father_per_week} = <<{jake_per_week}+{brother_per_week}+{father_per_week}={total_per_week}>>{total_per_week} papayas.
For {num_weeks} weeks, Jake will need to buy {total_per_week} x {num_weeks} = <<{total_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_papayas}>>{total_papayas} papayas.
